articles.name: Binance Chain Testnet Bug Bounty Program
articles.title: Binance Chain Testnet Bug Bounty Program
articles.body:
Fellow Binancians,

To speed up the launch of the Binance Chain mainnet, Binance is sponsoring a bug bounty program to help iron out any remaining issues on the Binance DEX!

Binance is offering a bounty of up to $10,000 USD in BNB for each vulnerability found by researchers on *.binance.org (website), *-dex.binance.org (API) and Binance Chain. Please submit reports at: https://bugcrowd.com/binance.

Rewards will be evaluated based on the level of security impact on reported vulnerabilities. Please read the Binance Chain Bug Bounty Program for details, documentation and vulnerability classifications, before submitting a report.

Terms:

  1. Binance reserves the right to cancel or amend the bounty or bounty rules at our sole discretion.
  2. Rewards will be issued within 2 weeks after the vulnerability report is verified. You will be able to login and see your prize via Distribution History > Account Center.
  3. Rewards will be paid out in BNB. Binance may award an additional reward bonus for exceptional reports at our discretion.
  4. Binance will only reward the first verified report of a vulnerability; similar reports that are submitted will not be rewarded.
  5. All tokens on the testnet are virtual assets, which are only used for testing.

To further test the platform, Binancians are encouraged to join the Binance DEX Simulated Trading Competition starting at 2019/03/07 8:00 AM (UTC), for a chance to win 10,000 BNB (worth $100,000+ USD at time of writing).

To start trading on the Binance DEX testnet, please visit: https://testnet.binance.org

Thanks for your support!

Binance Team

2019/03/04

Find us on:

Telegram: https://t.me/binanceexchange

Twitter: https://twitter.com/binance

articles.name: Binance DEX Simulated Trading Competition - Test Your Strategies to Win 10,000 BNB!
articles.title: Binance DEX Simulated Trading Competition - Test Your Strategies to Win 10,000 BNB!
articles.body:
Competition Period: 2019/03/07 8:00 AM-2019/03/21 8:00 AM (UTC)

In order to increase awareness of Binance DEX within the Binance Chain community, Binance has decided to sponsor a simulated trading competition on the Binance DEX testnet. All users who hold at least 1 real BNB on their Binance account will be eligible to participate in this Binance DEX Simulated Trading Competition. Each Binance.com account is able to register a maximum of 20 Binance Chain addresses and will receive 200 virtual testnet BNB tokens to each address to use as their starting funds before the Binance DEX trading competition begins.

Please note: All data on the Binance Chain testnet will reset right before 08:00 AM (UTC) on March 7, with all existing asset balances being cleared. After the reset occurs, the competition will begin.

Competition 1: Token Competition for Healthy Price Volatility

Individuals are able to issue and list tokens on the Binance Chain Testnet. The addresses that own tokens will be ranked in terms of the sum of each token price’s volatility over every five minute interval on the “Token”/BNB trading pair during the competition period. The summation will start when each token is listed, with the maximum price volatility that can contribute to the sum set at 10 (every five minutes). The greater this sum of volatility is at the end of the competition period, the higher each token will be ranked. The initial price of each Token must be set at 1 BNB and there is no limit to the total supply of each token type. The rewards structure is as follows:

1st Place: Win 3,000 BNB
2nd Place: Win 2,000 BNB
3rd Place: Win 1,000 BNB

NOTE:

  • Guides: How to issue a Token. How to list a Token
  • This volatility competition is limited to “Token”/BNB trading pairs only
  • Each issued token must have at least 20,000 unique addresses holding the token and each address must have also executed at least one buy or sell transaction of the token during the competition period to be eligible for a reward.
  • All addresses registered under the same Binance account are only qualified for one reward.
  • Trade Volatility = Sum (min (The highest and lowest price spread within 5 minutes, 10))

Example:

Alice issued a new token, named ABC. The price movement over the first 25 minutes after the listing is as follows. The final trading fluctuation calculation is 35 for the 25 minutes.

Time

Highest price

Lowest price

Sum of fluctuations

Notes

10:00-10:05

3808

3790

10

High-low spread is 18.

Max volatility contribution is 10

10:05-10:10

3814

3802

10+10=20

High-low spread is 12.

Max volatility contribution is 10

10:10-10:15

3812

3806

20+6=26

High-low spread is 6.

Volatility contribution is 6

10:15-10:20

3815

3810

26+5=31

High-low spread is 5.

Volatility contribution is 5

10:20-10:25

3818

3814

31+4=35

High-low spread is 4.

Volatility contribution is 4

The difference between the highest and lowest price within each 5 minute interval is the length of the candlestick over 5 minutes. If its length is greater than 10, we will only take the max allowed volatility contribution of 10.

Competition 2: Absolute Return Competition

All wallet addresses are able to use the virtual testnet BNB distributed by Binance and will be ranked based on absolute returns achieved using their trading strategies on BNB, BTC.B, ETH.B, USDT.B, XRP.B tokens over the competition period. The rewards structure is as follows:

1st Place: Win 1,000 BNB
2nd Place: Win 700 BNB
3rd Place: Win 300 BNB
4th-10th Place: Split 1,000 BNB
11th-20th Place: Split 1,000 BNB

NOTE:

  • Though participants can trade on any pairs, only the trading returns on BNB, BTC.B, ETH.B, USDT.B, and XRP.B would be counted. Other new Tokens created by users across all addresses will have a value of zero. All earnings will be calculated in BNB terms. The other 4 non-BNB tokens will be settled at a “Historical Average” price at the end of the final trading competition to the BNB equivalent.
  • Absolute return calculation = [Final holdings - (opening holdings + holdings transferred in)]
  • Opening/Final holdings: total holdings balance in BNB equivalent at the start/end of the competition, including both available and frozen/locked assets
  • The maximum amount of holdings transferred into all the registered address from other unregistered addresses must not exceed 8,000 BNB. All additional transfers made into these addresses will be deducted from the final profit/returns figure.
  • Historical Average: Sum ( (Highest Daily Price + Daily Open Price + Daily Close Price + Lowest Daily Price) / 4) / Number of days
  • For all the wallet addresses registered under the same Binance account, the absolute return will be aggregated together.

Terms:

  • Binance reserves the right to cancel or amend the competition or competition rules at our sole discretion.
  • Rewards will be issued within 2 weeks after the competition ends. You will be able to login and see your prize via Distribution History > Account Center. All the address ownership must be verified via Transfer Memo before that.
  • All tokens on the testnet are virtual assets, which are only used for testing.

articles.name: BTT Trading Competition, 200,000,000 BTT To Give Away!
articles.title: BTT Trading Competition, 200,000,000 BTT To Give Away!
articles.body:
Promotion period: 2019/02/22 0:00 AM to 2019/03/01 0:00 AM (UTC).

To celebrate the successful launch of BTT on Binance Launchpad, we have, together with the BTT Team, committed a total of 200,000,000 BTT in prizes to give away to our users worldwide!

Deposits Promotion: 50,000,000 BTT in rewards!

All Binancians with net deposits (deposits minus withdrawals) of over 1,500,000 BTT made during the activity period will split a pool of 50,000,000 BTT.

Trading Competition: 100,000,000 BTT to win!

The top 100 traders will share a pool of 100,000,000 BTT based on the proportion of their own BTT trading volume against the total trading volume of the top 100 traders during the competition period. This includes buys and sells across any BTT trading pairs.

Reward Calculation:

Rewards for each user in the top 100 = (Each user’s total trading volume / Top 100 users’ total trading volume) × 100,000,000 BTT

Lucky Draw: 50 Winners to be drawn, each receiving 1,000,000 BTT!

50 lucky Binancians will have a chance to each walk away with 1,000,000 BTT. To be eligible for the lucky draw, traders will need to trade at least 5,000,000 BTT on Binance during the competition period (including buys and sells) in any BTT trading pairs.
To ensure fairness and transparency of the draw, we will broadcast the lucky draw live on multiple social media platforms. The livestream time will be announced at a later date.

Terms:

  • Binance reserves the right to cancel or amend the Promotion or Promotion Rules at our sole discretion.
  • Trading volume refers to total buys and sells (excluding wash trades).
  • Binance reserves the right to disqualify trades which are deemed to be wash trades or display attributes of market manipulation.
  • BTT rewards will be issued within 2 weeks after the competition ends. You can log in and see your prize via the Distribution History in your Account Center.
  • Sub-accounts will be treated as an independent account when participating in this activity.
  • Winners in the Deposit Promotion and Trading Competition will not be able to participate in the Lucky Draw.

Risk warning: Cryptocurrency investment is subject to high market risk. Binance is not responsible for any direct, indirect or consequential losses as a result of the trading competition. Please make your investments with caution.

articles.name: Binance Chain Testnet Now Online
articles.title: Binance Chain Testnet Now Online
articles.body:
Fellow Binancians,

Binance is pleased to announce that both the Binance Chain and the Binance DEX have now entered public testnet phase at https://testnet.binance.org .

Binance Chain is a new blockchain developed and released by Binance. Binance DEX is a high performance and user friendly platform built on top of Binance Chain, where users can create, issue and trade digital assets.

Today’s release will also include access to our Web Wallet, the Binance Chain Explorer and other related functions.

The Binance Chain Mainnet launch date will be announced at a later date.

User Guides:

  • How to set up a wallet on the Binance DEX
  • Accessing Your Wallet
  • Interface Guide
  • Funding Your Testnet Account
  • Binance Chain Explorer Guide

Other Related Links:

Website: https://testnet.binance.org

Community & Forum Discussion: https://community.binance.org

Technical Documentation & FAQ: https://binance-chain.github.io

Telegram: https://t.me/BinanceDEXchange

Thanks for your support!

Binance Team

2019/02/20

Find us on

Telegram: https://t.me/binanceexchange
Twitter: https://twitter.com/binance

articles.name: Binance Will Delist CLOAK, MOD, SALT, SUB and WINGS
articles.title: Binance Will Delist CLOAK, MOD, SALT, SUB and WINGS
articles.body:
Fellow Binancians,

At Binance, we periodically review each digital asset we list to ensure that it continues to meet the high level of standard we expect. When a coin or token no longer meets this standard, or the industry changes, we conduct a more in-depth review and potentially delist it. We believe this best protects all of our users.

When we conduct these reviews, we consider a variety of factors. Here are some that drive whether we decide to delist a digital asset:

  • Commitment of team to project
  • Level and quality of development activity
  • Network / smart contract stability
  • Level of public communication
  • Responsiveness to our periodic due diligence requests
  • Evidence of unethical / fraudulent conduct
  • Contribution to a healthy and sustainable crypto ecosystem

Based on our most recent reviews, we have decided to delist and cease trading on all trading pairs for the following coins and tokens on 2019/02/22 at 10:00 AM UTC:

  • CloakCoin (CLOAK)
  • Modum (MOD)
  • SALT (SALT)
  • Substratum (SUB)
  • Wings (WINGS)

Please note:

  • All trade orders will be automatically removed after trading ceases in each respective trading pair.
  • To view your assets after trading ceases, please ensure you have not selected “Hide small assets” in your Funds page.
  • Withdrawals of these coins and tokens from Binance will continue to be supported until 2019/05/22 at 10:00 AM UTC.

We thank you for your support as we continue to build the crypto ecosystem in a way that promotes transparency and long-term, sustainable growth.

Binance Team

2019/02/15

Find us on

Telegram: https://t.me/binanceexchange
Twitter: https://twitter.com/binance

articles.name: Binance Completes Distribution of Initial BTT Airdrop
articles.title: Binance Completes Distribution of Initial BTT Airdrop
articles.body:
Fellow Binancians,

Binance has completed the distribution of the initial BTT airdrop as part of the overall BTT airdrop program. You can login and check that the tokens have been credited to your account.

The distribution of BTT was calculated at a rate of 1 TRX = 0.1097681177 BTT and was based on a snapshot of TRX balances at a block height of 6,600,000 at 2019/02/11 15:59:15 AM (UTC).

Please note: TRX balances under 100 TRX (including those in trade orders) were not be eligible for the airdrop.

For the official announcement from BTT, please refer to BitTorrent (BTT) Airdrop program for TRON (TRX) holders.

For further information on Binance’s support for the BTT airdrop program, please refer to Binance Will Support the BitTorrent (BTT) Airdrop Program for TRON (TRX) Holders.

Thanks for your support!

Binance Team

2019/02/12

articles.name: Binance Enables Debit and Credit Card Payments
articles.title: Binance Enables Debit and Credit Card Payments
articles.body:
Fellow Binancians,

Binance is thrilled to enable debit and credit card payments for cryptocurrencies through our new partnership with Simplex.

As part of Binance’s larger mission to increase the adoption and mainstream accessibility of crypto, Binancians are now able to use Visa and MasterCard to buy BTC, ETH, LTC and XRP, and start trading on Binance.com within minutes.

To purchase cryptocurrency with a debit or credit card on Binance, please visit: https://www.binance.com/en/creditcard.

Benefits of using a debit or credit card on Binance:

  • Fast: Average 10-30 mins for cryptocurrency to reach your wallet
  • Low Fees: only 3.5% per transaction or 10 USD, whichever is higher
  • Convenient: Visa and MasterCard accepted

To learn more about our partnership with Simplex, read our press release here.

Note: Simplex payment processing is subject to local bank policies. For more information, please refer to the Simplex FAQ here and a list of jurisdictions restricted from using this service here.

Thanks for your support!

Binance Team

2019/01/31

articles.name: Updates to BitTorrent (BTT) Token Sale Events on Binance Launchpad
articles.title: Updates to BitTorrent (BTT) Token Sale Events on Binance Launchpad
articles.body:
Fellow Binancians,

Binance Launchpad will commence the BitTorrent (BTT) token sale at 2019/01/28 3:00 PM (UTC). There will be two simultaneous token sale sessions, accepting BNB and TRX respectively.

Token sale prices for each session are now locked and set at:

  • 1 BTT = 0.00001824 BNB (using a BNB price of 6.58000 USD)
  • 1 BTT = 0.00447261 TRX (using a TRX price of 0.02683 USD)

Further information:

  • Minimum contribution amount: 100,000 BTT (1.824 BNB or 447.261 TRX) = 12 USD
  • Maximum contribution amount: 166,666,666 BTT (3,039.999 BNB or 745,434.997 TRX) = 20,000 USD

For a further step-by-step guide on how to participate in Binance Launchpad, please click here.

Launchpad Session Links:

  • BNB session
  • TRX session

To learn more about the BitTorrent (BTT) project, read our in-depth Binance Research Report on BTT.

Project Links:

Website: https://www.bittorrent.com/btt

Whitepaper: BitTorrent

Reminder: Users need to complete their account verification and also be from an accepted jurisdiction to participate in this token sale.

* Users from the following countries will not be able to participate in token sales on the Binance Launchpad platform: Afghanistan,Albania,Belarus,Bosnia & Herzegovina,Burundi,Central African Republic,China,Cote dIvoire,Cuba,Democratic Republic of the Congo, Ethiopia, Guinea, Guinea-Bissau, Iran, Iraq, Lebanon, Liberia, Libya, Myanmar, North Korea, Republic of Macedonia, Serbia, Somalia, South Sudan, Sri Lanka, Sudan, Syria, Thailand, Trinidad & Tobago, Tunisia, Uganda, Ukraine, United States, Venezuela, Yemen, Zimbabwe.

Risk warning:

All investments are subject to high market risk. Please make your investments very cautiously. Binance will chose high quality projects, but will not be responsible for any investment losses.

Thanks for your support!

articles.name: How to Participate in BTT Token Sale on Binance Launchpad
articles.title: How to Participate in BTT Token Sale on Binance Launchpad
articles.body:
The Binance Launchpad will go live very soon, so make sure you are all set before the launch. The BitTorrent (BTT) token sale will start on January 28th at 3:00 PM (UTC).

Participation Requirements

KYC verification: all users must complete identity verification.

If your account is not verified and you would like to participate in Binance Launchpad, you may verify your account here.

Users from the following jurisdictions will be unable to participate in the token sale of BTT:
Afghanistan, Albania, Belarus, Bosnia & Herzegovina, Burundi, Central African Republic, Cote d'Ivoire (Ivory Coast), Cuba, Democratic Republic of the Congo, Ethiopia, Guinea, Guinea-Bissau, Iran, Iraq, Lebanon, Liberia, Libya, Mainland China, Myanmar (Burma), North Korea, Republic of Macedonia (FYROM), Serbia, Somalia, South Sudan, Sri Lanka, Sudan, Syria, Thailand, Trinidad & Tobago, Tunisia, Uganda, Ukraine, United States of America (USA), Venezuela, Yemen, Zimbabwe.

How to participate

Head to the Binance Launchpad page and Log in to your Binance account.

Users will be able to purchase BTT tokens using both TRX or BNB. Select the session of your preference to move to the next step.

Note that 60% of the BitTorrent tokens (35,640,000,000 BTT) will be allocated to the TRX Session, and 40% (23,760,000,000 BTT) to the BNB Session. The total Allocation is 59,400,000,000 BTT (6% of Total Token Supply) and both sessions will start on January 28th at 3:00 PM (UTC).

If you would like to learn more about the BitTorrent Token, you can find more information on Binance Research. When you are ready, click Buy now to participate in the token sale.

Please read the terms and conditions carefully before proceeding. If you understand and accept the agreement, check the box and click I Agree.

Next, you will be required to set the value of your contribution.

Token sale prices for each session are:
1 BTT = 0.00001824 BNB (using a BNB price of 6.58000 USD)
1 BTT = 0.00447261 TRX (using a TRX price of 0.02683 USD)

The minimum contribution amount is 100,000 BTT (1.824 BNB or 447.261 TRX) = 12 USD and the maximum contribution amount is 166,666,666 BTT (3,040.000 BNB or 745,434.997 TRX) = 20,000 USD.

If the captcha is illegible, click on the image to refresh.

When you are done, click Confirm. If there is high volume, your order will be entered into a queue. BTT will be allocated on a first-come-first-serve basis.

If your order has been successful, a message will appear confirming your contribution.

If you wish to view your Launchpad order history, Click My Orders in the upper right-hand area of the website to check your purchase records.

The Launchpad purchase records will give you information about the number of tokens purchased and the price that was paid.

The Public Sale of BTT will close once the hard cap is achieved or on February 3rd at 3:00 PM UTC (whichever is sooner).

Note: Delivery of BTT will occur within 15 days of the closure of the Token Sale on Binance Launchpad and will be visible in your account distribution history

articles.name: Simplex Fees & Limits
articles.title: Simplex Fees & Limits
articles.body:
Simplex fee is 3.5% of the transaction with a 10USD minimum (flat fee).

Daily limit is 20k USD per user.

Monthly limit is 50k USD per user.

Minimum transaction: 50 USD.

articles.name: How do I get started?
articles.title: How do I get started?
articles.body:
1，Click Funds, select Simplex, then choose the token name and currency you wan to pay with. Currently, we only support USD and EUR.

2，Please check the notes and the handling fee before continuing the order.

3，Double check the order details. Base charge is the charge for the cryptocurrency, Total Charge is the Payment amount including charge for the cryptocurrency and the handling fee. Read the disclaimer and click to agree the disclaimer.

4，Verify personal information, filling the required information.

5，Verify email and Phone number

-Verification code on the phone

-Verification link in the email.

6，After verifications, go back to the webpage and click continue.

7，Fill in the credit card info, must use your own card.

8，Upload your document to verify your identity

  1. It is a valid government issued ID
  2. It contains an expiry date
  3. It contains your date of birth
  4. It contains your name
  5. Document and the picture should be in color
  6. The picture should be in high quality: make sure the photo is not blurry and the lighting is bright enough
  7. All 4 corners of the document should be visible, for example- when you open your passport you will have 2 pages in front of you. Both pages should appear in the photo
  8. It has to be in English
  9. The photo should be in JPG format. PDF will not be accepted
  10. The files must be smaller than 4 MB each

9，Transaction complete

articles.name: Binance Will Support the BitTorrent (BTT) Airdrop Program for TRON (TRX) Holders
articles.title: Binance Will Support the BitTorrent (BTT) Airdrop Program for TRON (TRX) Holders
articles.body:
Fellow Binancians,

Binance would like to confirm support for the BitTorrent (BTT) Airdrop Program for TRON (TRX) holders.

Initial BTT Airdrop on 2019/02/11

For the first airdrop, corresponding to 1.1% of the total BTT token supply, we will take a snapshot of all TRX balances on Binance at block height 6,600,000 on the TRON blockchain (estimated to be 2019/02/11) and distribute BTT to TRX holders at a ratio of 1 TRX = 0.11 BTT.

Monthly BTT Airdrop Program

Binance will also support the monthly airdrop program of BTT. We will take a snapshot of TRX balances at 0:00 (UTC) on the 11th day of each month and distribute BTT based on the following calculation:

BTT received by User A = Amount of TRX held by User A at the time of snapshot / Total TRX held by Binance at the time of snapshot * Total BTT received by Binance based on total TRX holdings for the respective monthly airdrop.

The amount of BTT airdropped each month from 2019 to 2025 is as follows:

2019/03/11 - 2020/02/11: 990,000,000 BTT airdropped to TRX holders on the 11th day of each month during this period

2020/03/11 - 2021/02/11: 1,072,500,000 BTT airdropped to TRX holders on the 11th day of each month during this period

2021/03/11 - 2022/02/11: 1,155,000,000 BTT airdropped to TRX holders on the 11th day of each month during this period

2022/03/11 - 2023/02/11: 1,237,500,000 BTT airdropped to TRX holders on the 11th day of each month during this period

2023/03/11 - 2024/02/11: 1,320,000,000 BTT airdropped to TRX holders on the 11th day of each month during this period

2024/03/11 - 2025/02/11: 1,402,500,000 BTT airdropped to TRX holders on the 11th day of each month during this period

Please note:

  • TRX tokens that are pending deposit or withdrawal at the time of each snapshot will not count towards your TRX balance. Please ensure you leave sufficient time for deposits and withdrawals to complete prior to the snapshot.
  • TRX balances under 100 TRX (including those in trade orders) will not be eligible for the airdrop.

Please refer to the official announcement from TRON for further information: BitTorrent Foundation unveils more details regarding BitTorrent (BTT) airdrops for TRON (TRX) holders.

Thanks for your support!

Binance Team

2019/01/22

Find us on

Telegram: https://t.me/binanceexchange
Twitter: https://twitter.com/binance
